name: Gates of Hell
descr:
Prophesied through the ages, the end of the age of man is at hand. You are the Angel Cassiel, sent to Earth to destroy Satan's Demon legions before they purge the land of all mankind.

[b]Gates of Hell[/b] is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you must battle through relentless waves of Demonic terror!

[b]Coming Soon:[/b]
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1901990/Machine_Gun_Fury/]https://store.steampowered.com/app/1901990/Machine_Gun_Fury/[/url]
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2089770/House_of_Pain/]https://store.steampowered.com/app/2089770/House_of_Pain/[/url]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1136420/extras/H_Relentless.png?t=1658246635[/img]

There is nowhere to hide as you battle through Hell’s raging demon hordes. Keep on the move, find and equip powerful Angelic and Demonic weapons and stay alive as long as you can.

[b]How long can you survive?[/b]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1136420/extras/Screen2.png?t=1658246635[/img]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1136420/extras/H_GameFeatures.png?t=1658246635[/img]

[list][li]Face down [b]Horrific Demon Enemies[/b]; blood dripping zombie terrors, mutated humans, dark sorcerers, living skulls and huge demon bosses
[/li][li][b]Arena Based FPS Shooting[/b] set over a range of detailed 3D levels with cool visual effects and camera filters
[/li][li]Equip [b]Angelic and Demonic Weaponry[/b] and power-ups to destroy the Demon hordes, including Satan's Hammer, the Staff of Pain, God Bombs and many more!
[/li][li][b]Arcade Score Multiplier System[/b] for score-attack gameplay, with online leaderboard support
[/li][li]Extensive [b]Player Achievements and Rewards[/b][/li][/list]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1136420/extras/Screen1.png?t=1658246635[/img]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1136420/extras/SuperArcade.png?t=1658246635[/img]

[b]Gates of Hell[/b] continues our Super Arcade range of games, which began with Vektor Wars. An Arcade game played at home; pure action gameplay, high score chasing, fast reactions and lots and lots of blasting!

[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/365760/Vektor_Wars/]https://store.steampowered.com/app/365760/Vektor_Wars/[/url]
detail:
名称: Gates of Hell
类型: 动作, 休闲, 独立
开发商: Reset Games Ltd
发行商: Reset Games Ltd
发行日期: 2019 年 11 月 5 日
review: 全部评测: 6 篇用户评测 - 需要更多用户评测来生成整体评价
全部评测: 6 篇用户评测 () 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7 SP1+
处理器: SSE2 instruction set support
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
DirectX 版本: 10
存储空间: 需要 10 GB 可用空间
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。
